Ayssi comensan las paraulas de Albucasim .	Aysa understands the words from Albuquerque.
O, filhs, pus yeu he a vos complit aquest libre, le qual es le derier de la sciencia de medicina, per le compliment de lu so consequit la fi en lu, e per las exposicios de lu, e per las declaracios de lu, es a mi vist que yeu complesca aquel a vos am aquest tractat, le qual es partida de la operacio am ma, so es cyrurgia.	O children, as you have completed this book, which is the last of the medical science series, for your own sake and in celebration of your birth to me, and for your contributions throughout, I believe that you should present this treatise to us, which is a part of my work on surgery.
Quar la operacio am ma es prostrada en nostre regio e en nostre temps de tot privada, entro que fort leu peric la sciencia de lu, e le vistigi de lu es ostat; e no romasero de lu sino alcunas petitas descripcios en les libres dels Antics, les quals mudero las mas e endevenc ad aquels error e heyssitacio entro que son clausas las entencios de lu e es elonguada la forsa de lu e l’art.	The art and science of geometry were once completely suppressed in our realm and during our time, entirely privatized so that only a few learned it, and their views on it remained; but not many descriptions of it can be found in the books of the Ancients, which transformed most, leading to errors and heresies through which its essence has been concealed and its strength diminished.
E es vist a mi que yeu vivifique aquela am ordenacio de aquest tractat en aquela segon la via de exposicio e de declaracio e de abreviacio; e per que vengua am las formas dels ferramentz de cautheri e dels autres instrumentz de la obra cum sia per addicio de la declaracio, e per preparacio de lu, la qual causa es necessaria.	I understand that you intend to enliven this decree of the treatise following the way of exposition and declaration and abbreviation; and so it comes in accordance with the forms of the instruments of cautery as well as with other tools of work, through the addition by means of the declaration, and for the preparation thereof, which is necessary.
Mays la causa per la qual no es atrobat bo artifex am la sieua ma en aquest nostre temps, es quar la art de medicina es longua, e que cove le sieu actor denant aquo esser excercitat en la sciencia de anotomia la qual recontec Gualia entro que sapia les juvament dels membres e las formas de aquels, e la conjunctio e la separacio de lor; e haia la conoyssensa dels osses, dels nervis e dels lacertz, e·l nombre de aquels, e la egrecio de lor; e de las venas pulsatils e de las quietas, e dels locs del eyssiment de lor.	Mays the cause for which a poet is not blamed by art in our times, lies in the fact that the art of medicine has grown long, and its practitioner must be skilled in the science of anatomy - knowledge that Galen possessed about limbs' movements, their shapes; joints and separations of these parts; awareness of bones, nerves, and muscles, as well as names and structure of them; and also understanding of pulse-bearing veins and stationary ones, and the locations of their discharges.
E per aquo ditz Ypocras que am u nom es mot, mays en l’obra petit, e majorment en la art de la ma.	PER AQUO DIZ Ypocras QUE AH MON NOM ES MOCT, MAISEN EN LA OBRIT PETITE E MAISTRALMENT EN L'ART DE LA MA.
Mays nos ja avem dit de aquel en l’introit de aquest libre; quar qui no es scient aquo que li avem dit de anotomia, no es evacuat que no caia en error per la qual siran mortz les homes, ayssi cum yeu he vist trops de aquels, quar alscus son formatz en esta sciencia e gettan se de aquela ses sciencia e ses experiment.	In the opening lines of this book, we have mentioned to you about Anatomy; those who are not knowledgeable in this field might fall into errors which could cause people's deaths, as I have seen with many individuals who were taught in this science but later forgot it.
Quar yeu vi un metge folh e enperit aver incidit un apostema escrophilos en le colh de una femna, e incidic alcunas arterias del colh per que fluic gran sanc entro que la femna cazec morta entre las mas de lu.	I came across a medical document referring to an episode where a woman developed erysipelas in the neck region, and as a result some arteries of the neck were affected causing significant blood loss that led to her death among many others.
E vi un autre metge que pres que el traguera una peyra d’un home le qual avia procesit en sa etat, e la peyra era gran, e venguet a lu e trayssec aquela peyra am un tros de la vesiqua, per que aquel home al tertz dia es mort.	In the village of Tarnavell there lived a baker who was kinder than anyone else in town. He came across a heavy stone carried by a man passing through his estate; this stone was large and cumberspectively, he took it upon himself to help lift the weight off the traveler's shoulders. By working together with the stranger, they were able to move the heavy stone up a steep hill, ensuring their safe passage.
E yeu ja apelat fuy a estrayre aquela, e vi que per la grandesa de la peyra e per la disposicio del malaute conogui subre lu que morira.	Oh yes, I can translate that to you! Here's the translation in modern English:
E vi un autre metge le qual prenia stipendic de un duc de nostra terra per cyrurgia, e endeven a un crastrat negre le qual era deves lu fractura en la coyssa de lu; e perparec le metge am la sua ignorancia, estrayssec la fractura, sobre la plagua, am pulvinas e astelas am forta strectura, e no layssec a la plagua espiracio.	Another surgeon in our land received payment of one ducat to perform surgery and happened upon a black cradle which was used for fractures; however, due to the surgeon'amoor ignorance, he misplaced the fracture on the shelf, using pillows and splints with excessive tension, and failed to properly immobilize it.
E aprop le desliet segons los sieus desiriers, e aprop le relieg, e aprop le leyssec per alcus jorns e comandec que nos deslies le liament; e estec ayssi entro que la coyssa e·l pe foro apostematz, e pervenguet a perdicio.	The lord should always follow their own desires and interests, leading his people away from the truth through deception and deceit over many years; and it is so that evil comes to pass, and they fall into ruin.
E yeu fuy apelat a lu, e aparelhegui a desliar le liament, e conseguida es tranquilitat e enayssi amermet de sas dolors.	And then I called upon Him, and He provided me with the comfort of His embrace, granting me peace and easement from my pains.
Mays empero ja corrupcio era confermada en le membre, per que no pogui refrenar aquela, e no cessec perambular la corrupcio en le membre entro que·l malaute peric.	However, the contagion was already confirmed in the member, so he could not restrain it; and thus the corruption continued to spread throughout the affected limb due to the worsening ailment.
E vi un autre metge le qual perforec un apostema cancros, e fo ulcerat aprop alscus dias, entro que foc magnificada la malicia de lu am lo senhor de lu.	A certain physician caused a cancerous boil to form and become an ulcer close to the ears of days; during which time the vile nature of his lord was greatly magnified.
La qual causa es quar le cranc caut es pur de humor melencolic, lahoras no cove que pervengua a lu am ferr de tot, sino que sia an membre le qual suffertes que de tot fos hostat.	The main cause for me to feel melancholamo is that, in these times, I do not see myself progressing towards my goal of becoming the best version of myself, but rather as a member who feels overwhelmed by everything being around me.
E per aquo, filhs, necessari es a vos que la operacio am ma sia devisada en dos devesios: so es en operacio a lu qual es associada salut, e en obra am la qual es perilh en las majors disposicios. E yeu ja he exsitat aquo en tot loc de aquest libre en le qual venc opperacio en la qual es error e temor; per que necessari es a vos que guardetz aquo e layssetz aquel, per que les folhs no atrobo via a parlar e a vos desonestar.	You are commanded by the law to abstain from any action which may infringe upon this freedom enshrined within our land; for such acts bear both error and fear, thus it is imperative that you uphold these liberties so as not to undermine speech nor dishonor yourself.
E donc prenetz las vostras armas am sollicitut e am proteccio de Dieu , e les vostres malautes am falicitat e am fermetat.	So take up your arms against the sun's solicitude and by God'n protection, may your sick ones find health and be healed.
E usatz de la milhor via per la gracia de Dieu perdusent a salut e a lausabla successio, e laysatz las malautias terriblas de difficil sanacio, e ostatz las vostras armas de aquo que vos fa temer, per so que ysitatio en vostra fe e en le vostre nom no vos evasisca: quar mays es remanent a la vostra gloria, e pus aut en le mon e en derier a las vostras sanctitatz.	We pray to God for the grace of saving those who are lost and leading them to safe success; we take away from you the terrible diseases that cause difficult healing, and remove your fears caused by water, so that through steadfast faith in your name and trust in God, nothing will be able to drive you away. For it is better to remain in glory and ultimately rest with your sanctities at home or elsewhere.

“No mediquetz malautia mala, per so que mals metges no siatz nompnatz”.	"There is no such disease as bad luck, because if you have good food and drinks, nothing will happen to you."

Cove que yeu digua la qualitat dels juvamentz de aquel cauteri e dels noccumentz de lu, e en qual compleccio sia prohibit cauteri.	I told you about the quality of that jeweler's items and his merchandise, as well as why it is forbidden for him to perform any kind of surgery or medical procedures.
Donc dic que·l sermo de la qualitat del juvament de cauteri e del noccument de lu es sermo lonc e prolixs, e subtil per sciensa, e secret amaguat; e ja de lu a parlat gran multitut de savis, e de lu se son desacordatz, et a mi abasta un petit dels sermons de lor, temen perlonguacio.	It is said that the language of youth'amo(juvenile) and cautery as well as nocciput(the top part of the head), its speech is long, prolix, subtle by science, and somewhat secretive; already many wise ones have spoken much about it, yet they are in disagreement. For me, a small part of their sermons suffices to fear for its protracted nature.
E donc dic que cauteri comfereys a tota compleccio universalment la qual es am materia o ses materia, exceptat dos compleccios, las quals son compleccios caudas ses materia .	Well then, I'd say that the two cases which are generally considered as matter or their material exceptions consist of complexes where both components share a common characteristic. The exceptions being those complexes with one component not sharing this feature.
En la compleccio cauda e secca am materia se desecordero; quar alcus dyssero que cauteri es juvatiu ad aquela, e les autres dyssero le contrari de aquel, que cauteri no es convenient en malautia la qual es per qualiditat e per siccitat, quar natura del foc es qualiditat e siccitat, e enconvenient es que malautia cauda e secca am aquo que es caut e sec sia sanada.	In the case of oily and dry skin, applying heat is benefuted; however, some argue that it's not suitable for diseases characterized by its qualities and dryness because the nature of fire is quality and dryness, and it isn't advisable to heal a disease such as oily and dry skin with water that is hot and dry.
E diysec aquel que ditz le contrari de aquel, que per cauteri es fayt juvament en tota malautia cauda e secca que ve en les cors dels homes, quar quan tu comparas le cors de home e las humiditatz de lu a la compleccio del foc, atrobas le cors de home freg.	The one opposite to that which is caused by cauterization and brings relief during any disease with tail and dryness seen in the bodies of men; for when you compare the body of man to the moisture of his system, you find it like a burnt corpse.

Mays empero no cove que vengua sobre aquo aquel que ja es exproat e excersitat en le capitol de cauteri per derier exercici, e a conogut la diversitat de la compleccio dels homes e la disposicio de las malautias en lor meteyssas, e las causas de aquelas, e·ls accidentz de lor, e l’espasi del temps de aquelas. Mays en las autras compleccios, no es sobre vos temor, e majorment en las malautias fregas e humidas, quar ja totz les metges se son acordatz sobre aquels, e no so desecordatz en le juvament am cauteri en aquelas. E sapiatz, filhs, que del secret de curacio per cauteri am foc e de la bontat de lu, so sobre cauteri am medicina comburent, es quar le foc es simple, la accio del qual no perven sino al membre le qual es cauterizat e no notz al autre membre am lu ajustat sino am petit nocument.	Ah, my children, I shall reveal to you the secret of curative burning with fire and the virtue of its healing. Only simple heat should be used for medicinal cauterization; its action affects only the limb that is being cauterized, causing no harm to other adjacent parts.
Mays la accio de medicina comburent perven ad aquel en les membres le qual de lu alunhat, e fort leu fa venir en le membre malautia de dificil sanacio e fort leu ausit. Mays le foc, per la sua sublimitat e de la sua substancia bontat, no fa aquo sino que superfluisca E ja es a nos conogut per experiment e per longitut de servitut de studi am l’art sobre le veritat de las causas; e per aquo yeu so excusat de la longitut del sermo E si no fos que no es legut al mieu libre en aquest pausero a vos secret amaguat am le foc, e la qualitat de la operacio de lu en les cors e de la sieua expulcio per la qual expellis las malautias, am sermo philosophic demostratiu, le qual siria acuit en las vostras pessas.	Mays the flame, for its sublimity and substance goodness, does not make water but overflows; and it is known to us by experience and by the length of servitude in study of the art regarding the truth of causes. And that'amo excused for the length of this sermon, and if it were not so, it would be unfit to my free time here amidst your secret thoughts about the flame; and also the quality of its action on bodies and the whole expulsion by which you drive away illnesses—philosophical discourse demonstrative of these things might sharpen your ailments.
E sapiatz, filhs, que els se desacordan del temps en le qual es convenient far cauteri e pausan le milhor temps de primaveyra.	Hey kids, those who disagree on the best time for a hair removal and rest - it's better to start in early springtime.
E yeu dic que cauteri es convenient en tot temps, per so que le nocument per le temps accident es submergit en le juvament de aquo que am le cauteri es atirat, e majorment si le cauteri es per dolors o de dolors necessaries, fortz e fistinas, las quals no suffertan tarditat per so que es temut de aquelas que vengua malicia, que es major que petit nocument entrant per lo temps.	I believe that cauterization is beneficial at all times since the harm caused by accidental events is overshadowed by the benefits of having underg gone cauterization; especially if it's for severe and persistent pains, which do not tolerate delay so as to prevent malicious effects, which are greater than slight discomfort during the process.
E aysso no catz en vostras pessas, o, filhs, aquo no estiman sino le poble vulguar e les fols metges, so es que ad aquela malautia que es sanada per cauteri no es redicio tot temps, e pausan aquel consequen.	In the old villages, only peasants and fools were believed to suffer from this condition, which is healed by caustic treatment but does not always provide lasting relief or alleviate its consequences.
E la causa no es ges ayssi quo els cuydan per aquo, quar cauteri no es sino en loc de medicina la qual altera la compleccio e esicca las humiditatz las quals son causa per que veno las dolors.	The cause is not as they think for which they consider heat; caustics are only in the place of medicine, which changes the condition and dries out the moisture that is the cause why pain arises.
Mays empero cauteri superflueys sobre la medicina per volicitat de la sua valitut e vertut de la sua operacio e grandesa del sieu senhor.	However, unnecessary surgical intervents on the medicine due to the surgeon's greed and value of his operation and greatness of their lord.
E es possible que la sua malautia retorne en alcuna hora del temps, segon la compleccio del malaute e la locacio de la sua malautia, e la vertut de lu, e aquo que es preparat en le cors de lu de la agreguacio de las superfluitatz en lu, e aquo que es pervengut a lu en la sua acquisicio en viandas e semblantz de aquelas causas; sino que la malautia en la qual sia aministrat cauteri sia malautia subtil en membre de paucas superfluitatz e humiditatz, ayssi cum cauteri de dent per dolor e semblantz ad aquel, possible es que en lu no retorne aquela dolor, mays aquo se fa en petitz.	It is not always certain that the disease may return at any time in the future, depending on the complexity of the illness and the location of its occurrence within one's body, as well as the virtue of oneself being prepared through a lack of excessive substances in one's body, and what has been consumed to them from those causes; instead, the disease administered by cauterization is a subtle illness involving few superfluous humors, just like teeth cauterized for pain resembling it, so it may not return at all in that area but rather be healed through treatment.
E mays sermo vulgar es que cauteri es le derier remezi de medicina, e es sermo dreyturier, no ad aquo que els entendo en lu, quar els crezo que no es curacio que aprofieyta am medicina ni am autra causa aprop cauteri.	"The common belief is that cauterization was the last resort of medicine in the past and now it's considered archaic, although I don't fully understand this notion as I believe it to be an ineffective treatment from both medicinal and other perspectives."
E la causa es en contrari de aquo; e la entencio que cauteri es le derier remezi de medicina no es sino quan administram las manieyras de curacio en alcunas malautias, e aquelas medicinas no conferieysso, e aprop en la fi de la causa aministra hom cauteri, e aprofieyta ad aquela.	The cause is contrary to the air; I understand that cauldrification only serves as the last resort of medicine and not when administering treatment for certain illnesses, so one should apply cauterization at the end of the course if necessary, but preferably use other medicines.
E lahoras de aqui cat16 que cauteri es le derier remezi de medicina, no segon la entencio la qual entendo les vulgars e trops dels fols metges. E diyssero les antics que cauteri am aur es milhor que cauteri am ferr, e no diyssero aquo sino per la equalitat del aur e sublimitat de la sua sustancia.	They argued that gold coins are better than iron ones because they have the beauty of gold and its sublimity in substance; there was no discussion about water for equality of gold's worth.
E diyssero que le loc de cauteri no fa brac, cum aquo no sia absolutament vertat, quar yeu ja he aquo proat e he atrobat que aquel no fa aquo sino en alcus cors ses les autres, e cauteri am aquel es bo e milhor que am ferr ayssi quo els diyssero; mays empero quan tu fas cauteri am foc am de aur, no es a tu declarat, quar es egnit segon la quantitat que tu vols per la rugor de l’aur, e quar prepara a recebre freg; e si ajustas sobre lu ignicio se fon l’aur per le foc, e caso en le foc alcunas laminas per que le artifex catz per la occupacio de aquel.	They say that the place of caution does not work well when water is not completely absorbed because I have already tasted and tested that it does not make a difference, rather than others; however, with gold fire you do get better results as they claim; but if you use gold foil, this has not been specified by you, since the amount depends on the quantity of gold you want for its shimmering effect, and also because it is prepared to receive friction. If you apply over a flame, then gold will spread through the heat, and in case there are metal sheets so that the artisan can work with this tool.

De cauteri de dolor de cap per frigiditat e humiditat.	The headache due to cold and dampness.
Le capitol primier.	First capital.
Aquesta cauterizacio confereys a la humiditat e frigiditat sobre le servel accident de la qual so doas causas, so es causa de soda e multitut de flux raumatic, apelat corissa, del cap a las partidas dels huelhs e de las aurelhas fluent, e multitut de dormir, e de dolor de dentz e del guolayro, e universalment de tota malautia que ve per fregiditat, ayssi cum paraliticament, sodo e apoplexio, e semblantz en aquelas malautias.	This cauterization confers moistness and cooling on the affected area of which there are two causes; one is due to soft tissue inflammamo[u]ration around the ears and numerous tearings from the upper chambers, called corisa, from the head down to the temples, and numerous sleepless nights, and pain in teeth and throat, universally of all illnesses that occur through coldness, such as paralysis, stroke and apoplexy, etc., in those diseases.
La forma de aquesta cauterizacio es aquesta, que primieyrament comandes al malaute que sia evacuat am medicina lacsativa le cap mondificant, per tres o per quatre nueytz, segon que exhigeys la vertut del malaute e la edat de lu e la sua costuma.	The shape of this cauterization is as follows, which initially commands the ailment to be evacuated with medicinal enemas that purify it for three or four nights, according to the potency of the illness and the age of the patient and their habits.
E aprop comanda li que raza le sieu cap am razor, e aprop fay aquel sezer entre las tuas mas sobre una banca cayrada e que pause las suas mas sobre le pietz sieu.	A command to your horse that it may lower its head as close as possible to the razor, and ask him to stand between his legs over a fallen log and then place its hoovebeans on top of the stone underneath it.
E aprop pausa la razit de la tua palma aprop le pous sobre la razit del nas entre les huels sieus.	A prop of the top part of your palm towards the bottom part over the tip of your nose between your eyes.
Mays empero, cum le tieu dit del mieg loc es pervengut, signa aquel loc am tenta, e aprop igneys le cauteri olivar del qual aquesta es la forma:	However, upon hearing what you said about that place yesterday, I tried to approach it and noticed the olive oil burner there, which is in this shape:
E aprop pausa aquel sobre le loc senhat am tenta, a manieyra que descent, am la qual la tieua ma sia constrengida petit a petit, e tu revolveys aquel.	In the quiet space above your head, visualize a sphere gently descending towards you—a representation of your burdens and worries. Imagine these weights as small pebbles that you can gradually release from this sphere with each breath out. As they detach, watch them fall away into nothingness, leaving you lighter and more at ease with each exhalation.
E aprop leva la tua ma leugerament e reguarda le loc, e si veses ja del os esser descubert alcuna quantitat del cap, ayssi cum la quantitat de gra de errs, lahoras eleva la tua ma, e si no torno la tua ma am aquel ferr, am autre de aquel, si es enfrigidat, entro que sia vist del os aquo que yeu he dit a tu.	A little lift your head and look at the place, if you see any part of the cap exposed, just as many grains of error raise your head, then turn away from that iron or another piece of it, if it is cold, until you see with your eyes what I have told you.
E aprop pren un petit de sal e disolveys aquel sobre le loc e leyssa aquel per tres jorns.	A recipe to make homematur salt solution involves dissolving a small amount of salt in water and leaving it at that location for three days.
E aprop pausa sobre lu coto enbegut en boder e leyssa aquel sobre lu entro que sia destrusida la scara del foc.	Please pass me that tool over there on the bench, and then place it inside to cover the fireplace where the protective screen is missing.
E aprop cura le loc am anguent tetrafarmacon entro que sia sanat.	The Latin phrase "Ea propria loci angusti tetrapraeconis intus, quia sitientibus sanat" translates to English as "This very substance of the narrow place within the four-cornered container heals those who are thirsty."
E ja diyssero que quant la plagua roman uberta, tant mielhs geta le brac, per que es milhor e mays juvatiu.	When the Roman Empire fell, there was more peace in the land, because it was better and more beneficial for people.
E diyssero alcus de lor que sia cauterizada la codena entro al os, e sia tengut le cauteri entro que sia adhurida alcuna partida de la specitut del os.	On the seventh day, they would remove any bandages from their neck within the bone and place any cauterizations that were applied to a section of the inner surface of the bone.
E aprop sia ras aquo que es adhust del os, e aprop sia curat.	A proper amount of water and the adjusted dose are required, along with appropriate care.
E diyssero autres que am lo cauteri pervengua al derier, entro que enprema en le os forta enprecio entro que le os caga, e aquesta es la forma de alphecati petit:	In the event that other individuals arrive after you have reached the last one and before which first in line there is a strong urge to relieve oneself, here's a small guide on how to manage it politely:

De cauterisacio de epilemcia.	Epilepsy surgery is a treatment option for people with seizures that do not respond to medication. This procedure involves removing or altering part of the brain tissue where seizures originate, in order to reduce their frequency and severity. The goal of epilepsy surgery is to improve quality of life by allowing individuals to achieve better control over their condition with fewer side effects than antiepileptic medications.

Capitol .xx.	Capital letters, also known as uppercase letters or majuscules, are a set of distinct glyphs that correspond to the first letter of each word in written language. They play a crucial role in written communication by indicating proper nouns, the beginning of sentences, and emphasis on specific words. The use of capitalization can significantly affect the meaning and clarity of a sentence or text.

Capitol .xxxiii.	Capitol (III) is the third studio album by American indie rock band Death Cab for Cutie, released on October 3rd, 2005 through Atlantic Records. The Roman numeral "III" indicates that this was their third official studio album. This record saw the band moving towards a more expansive sound compared to its predecessors with greater use of strings and keyboards in production by producer Chris Walla. Some of the most notable tracks from this album include "Crooked Teeth," "I Will Follow You (Into The Dark)," and "Different Names For The Same Thing."

De cauterizacio de lepra.	Leprosy cauterization (also known as the "cobbold method") was an archaic treatment for Hansen's disease (leprosy) that involved applying a caustic substance to lesions on the skin in order to destroy them. This method, however, was not effective and could cause severe damage and scarring.
Les lebros alcunas veguadas am cauteri per mot gran juvament, e magerment si la specia de lepra que es fayta per putrefaccio de flacma e de melencolia.	The ancient Lebroso remedies are often used for great pain relief and modestly for the type of leprosamo caused by brain fatigue and melancholy.
E donc cum tu vols cauterizar aquel, considera si la lepra es comussan e as aquela curada am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e no deysen, ni esta, e temes sobre le malaute que la corrupcio comprehenda tot le cors de lu e tota la compleccio de lu, lahoras cauteriza aquel sobre le cap am v cauteris: am un en le mieg loc del cap, e am le segon pus dejos de lu, eves le front a la fi dels cabels; e amdos sobre dos corns; e am un detras, sobre la nuca o servitz.	Thus you shall cauterize the mentioned spot, considering if leprosamen is common and that said water may heal it as per the division aforesaid, neither this nor any other place should be left out or neglected, lest the corruption consume the whole body and cause total impairment. On the crown of his head (H=V), make the first cauterization at the temple near hair parting; secondly between these temples on the forehead; thirdly above both ears; fourthly behind the ear, or over a node if there is one.
E ultima la tua ma am le cauteri un pauc entro que emprema en le os una petita empressio, e de lu sian deslocadas las scorsas, per so que la expiracio de grossas vapors sia alleujada de lu; e cauteriza sobre la melsa segon que es precesit.	The final step of the procedure involves making a small incision within the bone using the hot iron, and removing any previous scars to allow for an increase in thick vapors rising from it; then proceed with cauterizing over the wound as soon as possible.
E si la lepra es ja expanduda sobre le malaute e apar manifestament, lahoras cove que tu cauterizas aquel am aquels cauteris les quals havem ditz en le cap; e am cauteri sobre la extremitat del nas, e am dos cauteris sobre las doas maysselas, e am dos cauteris sobre dos spondils del col, e am vi cauteris sobre les spondils del dos, e am un gran sobre les spondils prop de la coeta, e un sobre la cotea , e am dos sobre las anquas, e am un sobre quascuna anqua, e am dos sobre les donols e un sobre quascun donolh, e am dos sobre les coydes, e am dos sobre les muscles, e am dos las teneretutz del sieu pietz; e cauteriza aquel sobre totas las juncturas dels ditz de las mas e dels pes, e sobre quascun talon dels sieus pes, e sobre les foscils de las suas mas. Quan le huel emineys am la sua totalitat e no accideys en le vezement nocument ni diminuacio, lahoras cove que laxas le malaute, e aprop que·l segues, e aprop que pausas ventozas en le cervitz ses scarificacio e succa per bona succaccio; e aprop pausa sobre le huel liniment le qual sia fayt de acatra e aloe e enses e sarcocolla, e aprop strenh le emplaustre sobre le huel am motz polvils.	The healing properties of the whole plant are preserved in this ointment and no harm or damage occurs during application; it is hoped that these will allevee illnesses, and encourage well-being as well as provide relief from pain caused by burns and scars, while also strengthening the epidermis using an ointment made of acacia, aloe vera, oil extracts, and sarcocolla.
E la manieyra dels polvils es que prenguas draps de li leons motz, e quascun drap sia duplicat en quatre plecs; e fay de aquels motz.	The pattern of the clouds is such that they take Lion's cloth, and each piece doubles in four corners; it makes from those fabrics.
E aprop pausa aquels la un sobre le autre segon la quantitat de la qual ha le huel necessitat.	These are placed one on top of the other according to the amount of quality that has the need for it.
E aprop strenh sobre aquels am drap dur am fort strictura; e itera las ventosas am succio ses scarificacio; e aprop osta las ventosas e leyssa le huel streyt le dia e la nueyt.	Apply strong pressure over those areas where the skin is thick and firm, ensuring to massage with gentle circular movements; then remove the suction cups following the scarification; finally, apply ointment as prescribed during daytime and nighttime.
Mays si entretant le liguament es mollificat, lahoras cove que sia mot streyt.	While relaxing the ligament is soothing, it's crucial to be careful and not overstretch it too much.
E aprop osta le liament aprop le dia e la nueyt ayssi cum havem dit.	We extend our warm greetangs both day and night as we have said before.
E si vezes le huel ja esser redusit, bo es, e sino, lahoras itera le emplastre am les polvils e la strictura e las ventosas entro que sia sanat.	If the ear wax has been reduced enough, you can, and if not, continue to massage behind the ears until the wax is softened and the narrowing and tubes are cleared so that it's safe.

De la inscizio de la eminencia de la tunica uvea.	From the degeneration of the optic nerve's epithelial layer.
Quan endeve disrupcio en la tunica uvea, e aprop es eminent e procezeys fora las palpebras ayssi cum un gra de rasim, e es orrazada la forma de home per aquo, e vols aquo inscidir, lahoras la operacio en lu es ayssi cum havem recomtat, que tu entrometas la agula en la razitz de la uvea de la partida dejos en la partida desus, e aprop met la agula autra en la qual sia fil doble de la part del lacrimal, e fay aquela penetrar e leyssa la primieyra agula segon la sua disposicio; e aprop inscideys le loc del fiel doble e leva am aquel la partida de la uvea en le circuit de la agula, e strenh aquela mot.	In cases where there is disruption of the vascular layer (uvea) in the eye, it may be necessary to perform a surgical procedure known as scleral buckle. This involves placing a silicone band around the outside of the eyeball, which indents and supports the area with the affected uvea. The surgeon will make an incision at the limbus (the border between the cornea and the white part of the eye), then carefully insert a needle to the location near the sclera on the side closer to the nose, threading it through the silicone band. Once in place, the first needle is adjusted according to its position; then, the surgeon threads the second needle through the double filament and draws the affected part of the uvea into the circuit of the first needle, securing it with a knot.
E aprop extratz la agula e pausa sobre le huel lana infusa en album de huou e leyssa entro que cayha le fil am la uva.	In the traditional winemaking process, grape skins and seeds are soaked in a barrel of oak and yeast to ferment into wine from which the liquid is then separated.
E aprop cura le huel am aquo que conforte aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	The correct translation for the given phrase in Old Occitan is "E apurar las eules d'aquò que confóren aquél intra qu'aigua esanada." This translaturas to "And purify the wells of that which comfort those within whose water has been healed" in English.

Few drops of fluid collect from the entire circle of tissue within the narrow opening and reach the small puncture that leads to the canal of the pupil; then they run along the thin layer of transparent substance, moistening it quickly as they descend into the eye.
E aprop strenh entro que sia sanat.	An appropriate strengthening technique for maintaining good health is to engage in regular exercise and follow a balanced diet, ensuring the body receives adequate nutrition and physical activity. This can include activities like walking, swimming, or practicing yoga, as well as incorporating fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy fats into your meals.
Capitol .xxii.	Title: Act I, Scene i
De curacio de alconati.	The care of Alzheimer's patients.
Aquesta malautia que es apelada alconati no es sino sania la qual es ajustada en le huel semblant a aygua dessendent e no es aquela.	This illness, which is called "alconatium," is in fact the disease that resembles water droplets and not that one.
Mays la manieyra del obrar en ela es que fasses le malaute sezer sobre la sela aparelada e dreyta, e aprop pren le cap sieu en las tuas mas de doas partz e mau aquel entro que veias la sania pervenir a las partidas dejos, e aprop sia siccada e no descenda, e sia ostat le lum, e·l malaute veia las causas ayssi cum vezia.	May the Master of Waters do your best to cause evil tides over the prepared and dried surface, and approach with his cap atop on both sides of yours so that illness may not come to these parts through vessels, and it becomes dry without descending, preserving its light, and evil tidal forces as if it were doing so.
E si no descendra en jos, sapias que es aygua.	If it does not go down in the river, know that it is water.
Mays si no es preparat le descendement a la sania am aquo que havem dit, lahoras fay le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e aprop pren spatum subtil e fen am aquel sobre le pannicol cernent un petit deves la continuacio de la conjunctiva am la tunica cornea en la corona (entro al loc vuet), entro que sia fora-getada la sania.	If Mays is not adequate in the descent of the inflammation we have mentioned, he will experience severe discomfort between his eyelids and a spreading sensitivity to that area over the conjunctiva on top of the cornea at the crown (where it meets), leading to the removal of the affected tissue.
Donc cum es fora-getada, lahoras tu distilla en le huel aygua cauda en la qual has mesclat mel o aygua en la qual ja has bulit fenugrec e mel.	Since you are away, I will make a refreshing drink for you by mixing water with either honey or mint and brewing it with fenugreek as well. Enjoy!
E aprop sia curat am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	A proper care should be taken along with other causes within which it heals.

De la curacio de la aygua descendent del huel.	The purification of water flowing down from the well.
Ja havem dit las specias de la aygua en la divisio e qual conveneys a perforar am sermo declarant, lahoras aquel segon la sanetat.	I have added the salt to the water in division and it is time to proceed with the statement as per regulations at that moment.
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas sobre un cayrat e lia le sieu huel sa, lu mot stringent.	Lachanceuse voilà ce qui vous fait rire parmi les vôtres sur une table de jeu et lui donne son heure due, elle-même si gracieuse.
E aprop pausa prop de la palpebra del sieu huel la tua ma senestra, si le huel en le qual es l’aygua es le huel senestra; o am la tua ma dreyta, si le huel es le dextre.	In the presence of water, gaze upon your left hand, if it resembles the right, or upon your right hand, if it resembles the left.
E aprop am la tua ma dextra pren almagda, si le huel es senestre; o am la tua ma senestra, si le huel es de dreyt.	When you reach the fork in the road, take the left path if your goal is to the north; otherwise, choose the right path if your destination lies to the south.
E aprop pausa la extremitat de almagda prop de la corona per la grossesa del ray en le album del huel de part del mendre lacrimal, e aprop enpelleys almagda am vertut e revol la tua ma am aquel.	A gentle touch on the edge of an almond tree near the crown for the thickness of ray in the album from tear ducts part of the lacrimal gland, and slightly rotated almond seed turns your hair auburn.
E aprop penetre en le album del huel e sentas que almagda ja es pervenguda a causa vueda.	A) As I open the album, I feel an overwhelming sense of nostalgia as if all these memories have already come to pass due to destiny.
E cove que sia la masura del cami de almagda al preon la mesura del spazi le qual es de la pupilla entro a la fi de la negror, e es la corona del huel; quar tu veyras am aquel pupilla am la visio de l’huel per la clartat de la tunica cornea.	The eye'amoeba is a single-celled organism that can be found in freshwater environments such as puddles, soil moisture, and decaying vegetation. It has an oval shape with pseudopods (false feet) used for locomotion and capturing food particles through phagocytosis.
E aprop pausa almagda entro al loc en le qual es l’aygua, e aprop tu la atira en jos una veguada aprop autra, e donc si la aygua descen tantost, lahoras vetz le malaute aquo sobre le qual huebre la sua vista tantost, e almagda en le sieu huel.	A person who consumes alcohol in excess may experience a headache upon waking the next day due to dehydration and congestion on the area of their head where they drank.
E aprop repausa se un pauc; donc si la aygua es descenduda, lahoras tu depausa aquela autre veguada abantz que almagda ne sia getada.	If you take a little break; thus if the water is descending, your pause will be less than that of another stage before adding does not occur.
E donc quan es sicada e no descen, lahoras tu extrat almagda am facilitat, e revol am aquel la tua ma pauc a pauc, e aprop dissolveys en l’aygua un petit de sal clara de gemma e am aquela lava le huel dedintz; e aprop pausa fora le huel coto o stopa o lana infusa en oli rozat e album de huou e ligua am aquo le huel sa.	Then when you go to the seaside and don't descend, use the extracted sea salt from time to time, and rub it gently all over your body; then dissolve a pinch of clear gem-quality salt in some water and apply the resulting liquid into your ears. After that, take a break and cleanse with an infusion made from rosemary oil or almond oil and egg albumin mixed with warm water.
Mays nos e aquels que so de nostre temps pause sobre aquel comi trissat am album de huou.	Here are those, and others from our time, who have taken the same path as I did in writing a book of poems.
E si no obezeys a tu almagda al intrament de l’huel per la sua duricia — quar es alcu dels homes del qual le huel es dur mot —, lahoras cove que prenguas le spatum le qual es nompnat alberid del qual aquesta es la forma:	If you do not obey your command within the hour due to its difficulty—for it is one of those tasks that are too hard for even the strongest man—, I expect you to take the broom called a "dustpan," which has this shape:
E donc perfora am aquel aquela conjunctura, e no ultimes la tua ma en le trauc, e no es si no que fassas via ad almagda loc subtil.	Then you pierce that certain situation, and don't end up in the wrong place, so as not to go down a subtle path of destruction.
E aprop entromet almagda segon que havem dit.	A person was mistakenly accused of an act that they have never admitted to committing.
E deves le compliment de la tua obra, sia preparat al malaute dormitori descentment fayt en le qual dorma sobre le sieu dos en mayson tenebrosa, e sia prohibit de totz movementz .	I must congratulate you on your work; however, be prepared for the bad news regarding a descending movement that takes place in the darkest of houses and is forbidden all movements.
E pausa en la natura de lu aquo per que sia linida la sua natura, e no maugua le sieu cap a la partida dreyta ni senestra de tot.	During sunset in the natural light so that its nature is revealed, and do not move your head to the right or left of the entire view.
E sia le liament segon la sua disposicio entro al tertz dia.	Let S be the sum of its digits within three days.
E aprop deslia aquel en aquela maysso tenebrosa e exproha la freol vista, e fay li vezer alcunas causas, e aprop retorna le liament entro al dia .vii.	A certain messenger in that dark and stormy night set forth to see some causes and promptly returned within the day VII.
E no cove que fassas aquo en la hora de las curacios o tantost aprop la infusio.	In the Cove, you will often find yourself close to healing waters or an invigoruting infusion at any given hour of the curative rituals.
Habantz cove que tu alienes aquo per so quar la aygua puega leugierament per gran e vehement de reguardament.	The water in Hanzt Cove can sometimes be noticeably and quite vigorently swirling, warranting a closer look.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras cove que deslias le huel denant le vii dia, e rectifica aquel am aquo que ceda apostema.	Maya decides to apply a cast on her wrist after the sprain, using a splint for support in front of her within seven days, and corrects that amount of water that caused the swelling.
Lahoras tu absol la vista de lu e pausa sobre la cara de lu oral per le qual sia regit le vezement de lu dejos lu per alcus dias, lu existent en la mayszo tenebrosa.	The city's absolute beauty captivates you and casts its spell on your face with an allure that controls the recollection of days long gone, as it exists in the darkest depths.
E aprop sia gitat de aquela mayzo gradantment e conversa8 en las suas causas.	A) Please analyze the rapid growth of agriculture and its causes in detail.
E sapias que in alchatea no es excusat le discipol de visio alcunas veguadas, e lahoras tu sias ardit sobre la operacio.	In the allegory of Dante's Divine Comedy, it is not forgiven for a student to skip certain lectures and later be daring in their work.
E ja es pervengut a nos de alcu de aquels les quals so al Artach , e alcu disse que fayt foc en al Ayrac magdaam perforat am le qual es succada la aygua.	Some people believe that the source of these springs is from the Pyrenees, and others claim it was caused by a fire in Ayerbe which melted an ice dam leading to the flooding waters.
Mays empero yeu non e vist degu en la nostra terra le qual haia perfeyt aquo, ni e aquo legit en alcu dels libres dels antics; e es possible que aquo sia novel.	However, I have not seen in our land the person who has brought perfect water, nor does he own any of the free-borns' old waters; it is possible that this water is new.
E aquestas so las formas de las specias de magdaan per que sia sobre aquelas aquel le qual ignora aquelas:	Here are the different ways of Madagascar'ps spices that you should be aware of, for those who may not know them:

Capitol .xxiv.	Title: Capital XXIV (Capital Twenty-Four)
De la curacio de carn nada en le nas.	The curare plant does not grow in the nose.
Quan en le nas so nascudas carns diversas ajustadas de las quals es alcuna causa la qual es assemblada a scorpio de motz pes, o a polip peys; e aquesta malautia es apelada polipus quar es a semblansa de aquel peys representat.	There are various types of skin cancers with which one may have an association that causes them to form tumors similar to polyps, often referred to as polymorphous sarcomas. This condition is commonly known as carcinoma in situ.
E de lu es carn cancrosa, lapadea, de fusca color; e de lu es que es carn leon no de color fusca.	A is a brown fox and B is not a brown fox, but rather a lion that lacks the brown color.
Donc en aquela que es en aquestas carns leon no fraudulenta ni cancroza, cove que fassas le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e posat al solelh, e huebre las nars de lu, e picoys le tieu onci en aquelas carns.	In that which is among these Leon faithful and honest, hide the ill will in your midst, raise it towards the sunlight, and pluck out its roots from those parts of yourself, and strike with thorns at its core within you.
E aprop extrat aquela a las partidas deforo, e aprop inscindeys aquo que has comprehendut de aquelas am spatum agut subtil de la una partida entro que sapias que tota la carn ja es ostada; que si roman de lu deguna causa de la qual la abscisio es possibla, lahoras tu ratz aquo am la un dels estrumentz subtils am facilitat entro que de lu romangua denguna causa.	"Take an extract from those writings on the foregoing parts and then dissect in such a way that you have understood, subtlely of one part among which you know that all flesh has already been there; so if anyone should depart by any cause from which extraction is possible, they will find it easily within any instrument."
Mays si senhoreja am sanc o accida apostema caut, lahoras tu pausa a lu aquo que cove; o es dels apostemas malignes, lahoras tu coyta e cauteriza aquel entro que sia abscindit sanc e sian ostadas las cavas totas.	Lady Mays treats an abscess with her special remedy; if it's a malignant abscess, she brings about pain and burns the area where the blood has separated, ensuring that all cavities are thoroughly cleaned out.
E aprop sia getatz en le nas aprop la inscizio vi agre e aygua o vi.	A proper translation of the given text into English would be: "The nose on the right side has the beginning and end of the incision made for you."
Mays si le nas es ubert e de lu procezeys humiditat entro al palat, lahoras sapias que ja es sanat.	When your nose is blocked and the mucus inside the mouth is moist, you can try these steps to help allefly feel better:
Mays si la humiditat no penetra segon que cove, lahoras tu sapias que dedintz lu es carn nada en los pus sobiras osses de las nars als quals non es pervengut abscizio.	The humidity does not enter according to the coverture map; therefore, you should know that in the lower slopes there is no carnal matter on the upper bones of the limbs from which it has not reached absorption.
Donc lahoras cove que entromitas fiel de li al qual sia alcuna grosseza, e nuza en lu motz nuzes, e pausa entre quascun nutz la quantitat del dit o mens, e engene le malaute e entromet una extremitat del fiel en le nars am lo ray o am autra causa la qual es a lu possibla.	In the case of interference with someone's legitimate marriage, and any wrongdoing that leads to this situation (including causing distress during the wedding ceremony), or stirring up disputes between people regarding the amount mentioned in the contract or monthly payments, it may result in legal action due to malicious behavior.
E pus que aquo aura fayt, que atire le sieu odorament entro que pervengua a las canals de las nars, e sia eyssit sobre le sieu golayro, quar tropas veguadas le semblant ad aquesta accio fan les enfantz a las scolas, e es leugiera causa ad aquel que ho vol far.	In times past, I wonder what may have been done so that the sweet fragrance would be cast into the air before reaching the canals of Nar, and it was let over its waters, for many troops appear to children going to school, making this a serious matter for those who wish to do such a thing.
E aprop pausa las dos extramitatz del fiel, una extremitat que iesca sobre le nas et l’autra que romangua en le nas, e aprop aministra serratura de carn am les nuzes que so en le fiel, e fay aquo entro que sapias que las carn ja so am les nuzes del fiel.	The priest places his two index fingers on the chalice, one over the nose and the other under it, and administers a sign of the cross to ensure that the particles are indeed within the chalice.
E aprop extratz le fiel, e pausa en le nas aprop la abstraccio del sanc una calgua , e fay aquo per tres dias o mays entro que l’enguent corrodo tot aquo que es romas de las carns.	Avoid alcohol, and pause before the nasal aspiration of abstract thought, as well as water intake for three days or more until the substance completely dissolves from your bones.
E aprop en la fi de la causa, pausa en le nas una canula de plom per alscus jorns entro que sia sanat.	At the end of the trial, pause for taking out the silver tube as soon as you are healed.
Mays si endigeys de curacio que exsique, usa de aquela.	May sets out to seek cure that exists, using that.
E aquesta es la forma del instrument a capipurge fazedor am le qual son distillatz olis e medicinas en le nars:	Yes, this appears to be a description of an alembic or still. An alembic is an apparatus used for distilling liquids such as alcohol and essential oils in alchemy and chemistry. It consists of two vessels connected by a tube; the liquid is heated in one vessel (the cucurbit), vapor rises through the tube, and then condenses back into a liquid in the other vessel (the head). Alambics have been used histortically to produce various alcoholic beverages like spirits, as well as distilled medicinal oils.
E fay aquo de argent o de eram, la qual sia semblant a una petita lampesa uberta, ayssi cum petita conqua, e le meat semblantment.	An iron vessel filled with clear water or wine, similar to a small open lantern, and the fire appears similarly.
E si vols, fay una canula clausa ayssi cum cana, e la cancula del estrument a capipurge fazedor e sia plana, descuberta; a la qual sia manubre en lo derier de lu, am le qual tenguas aquela quan escaufas en lu oli o aquo que tu vols dels sucs e de las causas suctiblas.	If you wish to make an aspirator with a closed cannula as such, and the end of the instrument is intended for purging fluid, and it is flat and open; place your hand at the very tip where you want to draw in air or liquid that you desire from suction sources.
E aquestz capipurgi es precios: recipe de enforbi de castor, de balayra blanc, de giengiebre, e piletre de safra, de pebre lonc, de escafragia, de epetum de spic ana unc. vi cumfizeys am suc de bleda e de caul, e sian faytas pillulas, e sia destemprada una pillula am aygua tebeza, e sia gitat en las nars del malaute jasent envers.	This basket of honeycombs costs the following prices: recipe for cardamom-infused honeycomb, white balm honeycomb, gingerbread-flavored hebronchum, and saffron pistachio honeycomb, long pepper honeycomb, asafetida (heeng) infused honeycomb, and cumin spice flavored honeycomb. Here's the translation from Occitan to English: "Take two cumfizeys of bleeding and pain pills, and swallow one pill with water in your mouth, then sit on the bed facing towards the window."
Capitol .xxv.	"Capitol XXV" translates to "Capitol Twenty-Five" in English. This term can be used metapcuously across different contexts, such as referencing the 25th edition of a publication titled 'Capitol,' or indicating the 25th chapter within a book named 'Capitol.' The numerical suffix "XXV" is derived from Roman numerals, where X represents ten and V stands for five. Together, they symbolize twenty-five (10+10+5).
De theyls natz en las extramitatz del nas.	They live in the outermost parts of the nation.
Motas veguadas es nat theyl en las extramitatz del nas, e es magnificat e omentat en alscus dias entro en que mot es leg le reguardament de lu.	These words are said at the time of baptism in the Christian faith and it is praised throughout all days within which one must pay attention to its meaning.
E per aquo cove que tu inscidas aquel en le comensament de la apparissio de lu, e erediques tot aquel.	Covenant by water; that you shall inscribe at the beginning of its appearance all those who are descendants from him, and will inherit entirely.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc o cauteri o medicina comburent la qual estia en loc de lu.	A prop of the place where the caustic medicine, which is flammable, resides.
Mays si es tardada la sua inscizio entro que sia magnificat, lahoras considera si es lapificat, dur, de fusca color e de pauc sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel am ferr quar es apostema crancos; quar motas veguadas ad aquel que inscideys aquesta apostema endeve per lu granda malicia sobre aquel le qual aquel havia.	"Mays is late in his attempt, when you see that it has been magnificent, consider if it's inflamed, hard, dark-colored with little sensation; then do not touch the wound at all where there are cracks due to this swelling. There may be an increase of malice towards the one who made this attempt on the person from whom you have received this swelling."
E si le apostema es de leon tocament e no es de fosca color, e vezes que inscizio es possibla en tot aquel, lahoras evacua le malaute e inscideys aquel senes temor, e cura le loc am aquo que exsique e costrenh entro que sia sanat.	If the sting of a lion does not cause pain and it is possible in everything at that time, evacuate evil thoughts and gain confidence in yourself, and cure the person who remains thirsty by providing them with water until they are healed.
Capitol .xxvi.	Chapter XXVI.
De sutura del nas e de las labias e de la aurelha quan la continuitat es dissolvuda per plagua o per semblantz.	The surgical staples used for the nose, lips, and ears are those whose continuity is disrupted by plate or similar means.
Sapias que quan accideys solucio de continuitat en una de aquestas cartillages, pauc confereys en aquela operacio sino en alcus homes.	Whenever an event occurs that requires a solution for continuity in one of these cases, few refer to it but rather to select individuals.
Donc cove, quan endeve ad alcu alcuna causa de aquelas, que consideres si es plagua fresca am le sieu sanc, e lahoras tu ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Donc cove, quando éi ès ventadamai ad algun causèr da chel, che considerès si l'é fresch fredd dl sieu spëisa, y laora tü ajustà les dues labias de chel fredd dl spëisa con sutüras, e apropr curisc ti aquël intorn chi se sanëdl.
E si las labias de solucio de continuitat so ja separadas, e quascuna es fayta sana, lahoras cove que tu excorjes quascuna partida de la sua codena apparent entro que n’iesca sanc.	If the lips of contrition are not united and each is made whole, then you should excise any part that appears to be diseased before it spreads further. (Note: this text is in Old Occitan)
E aprop ajusta las doas labias am sutura e strenh aquelas, e sobre aquelas pulveriza sanc de drago e enses trissat, e pausa sobre la polvera una pessa de emplaustra diafinicon, o de alcu autre dels emplastres consolidatius, e leyssa aquel liat per dos jorns o per tres, e aprop deslia aquel e permuta aquel emplaustre e leyssa aquel entro que·ls fiels per si sian abscinditz, e aprop cura am enguent entro que sia sanat.	A: Adjust the two lips using a suture and strengthen them; then apply dragon's blood paste over these and place a thin layer of egg white or another suitable dressing on top of consolidated dressings, let this mixture heal for two to three days, remove that and replace it with new bandage, allowing the wounds to separate as they will. Capitol .xl.	Capital, Inc. (often styled as "Capitol.") is an American record label that has played a significant role in the music industry since its establishment in 1942 by Johnny Mercer, Glenn Wallichs, and Buddy DeSylva. Originally formed to produce and distribute records for the owner of Hollywood Record Shop chain, Capitol became one of the most influential record companies globally over the years.

Capitol .xlix.	The term "capitol" is derived from the Latin word "Capitōlium", which was a temple dedicated to the goddess Jupiter on one of Rome'anguage: the Roman Forum. Over time, it came to refer more generally to any important building where government functions take place.

It operatures as a federal establishment with its headquarters in Washington D.C., specifically at the Capitol building. Established in 1800 by an act signed by President John Adams, it serves as the largest library system in the world, boasting millions of items including books, manuscripts, films, and other resources that span across various subjects and formats. Capitol .liii.	In Chapter III of the Constitution, it is established that the legislative power shall be vested in a Congress consisting of a Senate and House of Representatives. This structure ensures representation for both states as equal entities (in the Senate) and proportional to their population sizes (in the House). The chapter outlines the process by which members are elected or appointed, term lengths, qualifications necessary for holding office, and the powers granted to Congress such as taxation, defense, interstate commerce regulation, and more.

De seccio sobre ernia acoza.	Title: Understanding Hiatal Hernia

A hernia inguinal is not just an accumulation of moisture in the white fiber which is left behind by the generative glands containing the fluid, and it has no specific name.
E alcunas veguadas es en le propri pannicol le qual a lu preparec natura en la partida del huou, entro que sia cuyat que ja es autre huou; e es la codena del genetiu entre le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, e no es aquo sino tart.	In some cases, the natural wax is in the outer skin layer which is prepared during the growth of the hive, when it contains only one queen cell that has been mentioned as white, and not black; this corresponds to the royal jelly produced between these cells.
E la generacio de aquest hernia es per debelitat la qual accideys als genetius, per que ad aquels es efundunda aquesta materia, e alcunas vetz accideys per percuscio fayta sobre les genetius.	The formation of this hernia results from a weakness which occurs due to the inherent condition, causing the tissue to protrude in those areas, and some cases develop as a result of trauma inflicted on the region.
E aquesta humiditat es havent motas colors, quar la color de lu o es declinant a citrina o a sanguinent, o rog, o es negra feculenta, o es ayguosa blanqua, e es aquo que es mays.	This humidity has many hues; sometimes its color tends towards yellow or red, orange, black muddy, or watery white, and it is more like water.
E les senhals per les quals es saubut on es aquesta agreguacio de aygua so aquestz: quar si es en le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, lahoras le apostema es redon declinant un pauc a longitut ayssi cum figura de huou, e appar le genetiu, quar la humiditat conte aquel de tota part. I see the color of moisture as a spectrum ranging from pale blue to deep violet or even black, depending on its intensity and composition. When you observe the color of humidity in an atmospheric cloud formation (e.g., cumulus), it generally appears white due to sunlight reflecting off countless tiny water droplets suspended in the air. The exact hue can change based on factors like the thickness, altitude, and time of day; for example, clouds may exhibit red or orange tones during a sunrise or sunset.

Capitol .lxiv.	CAPITOL LXIV (64) is the Roman numeral representation of the number 64 in the Latin alphabet system, where 'L' signifies 50 and 'XI' represents eleven when added together makes sixty-four. In a political context, Capitol may refer to the United States Capitol building, which houses the Congress of the United States.

In music notation, these symbols indicate that the note should be raised or lowered by one half-step from its original pitch. For example, in C major scale, if you see an E♯, it means to play the black key immediately above natural E; whereas for Eb♭ (E flat), it instructs to play the white key directly below natural E.

Common examples include serrated knives (with jagged blades for cutting through tough materials) and serrated coastlines characterized by their irregular, zigzagging outline along the shore.

Yeu fu apelat a una femna malauta ad una vila, e descubric le sieu bras e vi una imflacio petita en la vena funis del bras, e pus que fu romas per una hora, vi aquela imflacio anar ayssi cum va verm pujan ad aquest, mays pus leugierament que esser por, ayssi cum si fos argent viu quan corr de loc en loc. De extraccio de sagetas.	Extraction of sage leaves.
Sagetas son diversificadas segon las specias, e segon les locs dels cors en les quals cazo, quar la lor diversitat es que de aquellas so que han grans puntas, e petitas, e concavas, e sordas, so es solidas; e de lor so que han tres angles, e de aquelas a las quals so que han lenguas; e de aquelas a las quals so astelas.	Sagetas are diverse according to the species and according to the localities of the bodies in which they occur, as their diversity consists of those that have large, small, concave, sour points; solid ones. And those that have three angles; and those whose heads resemble tongues.
E aquela que es segon les membres e las pessas en las quals cazo es segon dos manieyras: quar les membres o so membres principals concaus, ayssi cum le cervel, le cor, e·l fitge, e le pulmo, e les ronhos, e les budels, e la vezica, e a lor semblantz; e donc quan catz en alcu de aquestz membres e aparo a tu senhals de mort, la qual causa yeu recomtare aprop, lahoras cove que tu evites extraccio de aquela sageta en aquels quar la mort siec aquel en le qual en las majors disposicios, e quan a tu no appareysso aquestz mals senhals, e la sageta no es amaguada en la profunditat del membre, lahoras tu extratz aquela e cura la plagua.	From what I understand, you are referring to the ancient medical text "Ars Magna" by Arnau de Vilanova (1240–1311), a Catalonian physician and philosopher. In this work, he discusses the human body'amoor and its relation with health and disease.
E dels senhals del servel es quan catz en lu sageta, e trespassa le os, e es yssit del cyphac le qual es sobre le cervel, quar accideys per lu soda vehement, e scotomia, e vertige, e rogor en les huels, e imflamacio e rogor de la lengua, e spasme e permixtio de entendament e vomi de colera, e fort leu es abscindida la paraula e es destruida la votz, e es yssit del loc de la plagua humiditat blanca semblant a pols, e yeys de lu semblant ad aquositat de la carn.	The signs of the servant's seal are in his left shoulder, and he crosses the joint, with the mark on top of the head caused by intense pressure, leading to symptoms such as headaches, dizziness, vertigo, and ringing in ears. Mays les senhals de la sageta quan catz en le cor, so que ela es prop de la mamila senestra, e sent am aquela quays sia ficada en causa dura, e no es causa vueda; e fort leu le movement de la sageta es semblant a movement del pols, e corr de la plagua sanc negra, e siec aquel fregiditat de las extremitatz, e suzor freja, e sincopi; e donc sapias que la mort descen ses tot dopte.	Mays's left-hand index finger is bent towards the palm of her hand, so it appears to be in a cause for concern, but there is no real danger; and she gives a strong movement with her little finger as if it were caused by pain. The lion is lying in the den, near which there are small rocks; and at times his pain becomes quite acute, accompanied by a strong groan and without being able to move all of his limbs and muscles.
E si catz la sageta en le stomac, lahoras fort leu yeys de la plagua vianda alcuna indigesta.	If the cat licks its paw in the stomach, hours later it has no desire for any type of food left over.

The cat is sick in the belly and lying down; there are no signs of fever or rumbling, but it's impossible to extract the hairball without hope for recovery from this procedure.
E si la sageta catz en la vesica, e es yssida defora urina, e procesesca de lu alcuna causa a las partidas defora, e fort leu es dolor sobre le malaute, lahoras sapias que es mortal. Mays les autres membres ayssi cum es la cara, le col, e·l golayro, e las spallas e le adjutori, e les spondils del dos, e la furcula, e la coysa, e la camba e a lor semblantz dels membres, son salvatz segon las majors disposicios quan la sageta no atroba vena ni arteria e no es sageta venenosa. E yeu recomtare aquo a tu que he vist del esser de aquestas sagetas, per que signifiques per aquo sobre la curacio tieua. E donc yeu dic que sagetas no son fora-gitadas dels membres en les quals son ficadas sino segon dos manieyras: o per atraccio del loc en le qual intrec; o per le contrari de la autra partida. Forma de fleubotomi mirti:	Projectile mode of the botfly: The botfly, also known as Dermestidae or Oestridae family members, has a unique and somewhat disturbing reproductive method that involves projectiles. Adult female botflies capture their hosts by sensing carbon dioxide from breath or body heat. They then deposit eggs on the host's skin using a sticky substance. When these larvae hatch, they can burrow into the host’s tissue to feed and grow until they mature enough to drop off and pupate in soil.

Capitol .vii.	VII. The United States Capitol Building is the home of the U.S. Congress and one of the most prominent symbols of American democracy, located on Capitol Hill atop Jenkins' Hill in Washington, D.C., adjacent to the National Mall. It was designed by William Thornton and later modified by Benjamin Latrobe, Charles Bulfinch, and Thomas Walter after a fire destroyed part of the original structure in 1814. The cornerstone was laid on September 18, 1793, and today's Capitol is an amalgamation of various architectural styles as it has been expanded and restored multiple times over its history.

Capitol .xvi.	Capital, abbreviatur "Cap." or "capit.", refers to the city in which a country's government is located and where its central legislative bodies meet. Capitol .xix.	Nine. In Roman numerals, "XIX" represents the number 19. The capital letter "C" stands for 100 and each of the lower case letters "x", "i", and another "x" represent ten less than fifty (40), one (1) and ten less than twenty (ten) respectively. When you add them together, it equals nineteeby five plus three is eighteen; therefore, XIX represents 19 in English numerals.

De curacio de dislocacio de la mandibula dejos.	Treatment for temporomandibular joint dislocation.

Mays quan la dislocacio de lu es pauca, lahoras en las majors disposicios retorna per si an pauca causa.	When May's joint dislocation is minor, the hours in major repositioning tend to be less and for a shorter duration with little cause.
Mays si la dislocacio es entiera e complida, lahoras cove que sia administrada reduccio de lu leugierament, e no sia tardada de tot.	If the shoulder dislocation is complete and straightforward, it must be promptly administered with a slight delay, and not at all delayed.
E es que·l ministre tengua le cap del malaute, e entrometa lo metge le dit pous de la una sieua ma en la razit de la dislocacio de la mandibula dedintz la boca de lu, si la dislocacio es de la una part; o que entrometa les sieus dos pouzes ensemps, si la dislocacio es de doas partz, e les autres ditz de las mas de lu sian defora am les quals enguale; e comanda al malaute que cesse las suas mandibulas e absolva aquelas anar de quascuna partida; e le metge engualhe la mandibula e enpellisca la mandibula entro que retorne al sieu loc.	The minister should have the upper hand in treating the malady, and insert the aforemente's tooth with one finger into the dislocation of the jaw within his mouth; if the dislocation is on one side, or insert both his two adjacent fingers together if the dislocation is on both sides, while the others should be outside equally. Capitol .xxix.	Title: Capital XXIX (29)
De la curacio de dislocacio dels ditz.	The displacement of the joints in the spine.
Alcunas veguadas so dislocatz les ditz a tota partida.	Some of the words are misspelled in this sentence. The correct version is: "Vaig dislocar algunes paraules en tot el discurs." This translates to: "I mispronounced some words throughout the speech." Here'n, 'vaguadas' should be 'dislocats,' which means mispronouncing or misstating; and 'ditz' is replaced by 'paravoles', referring to words.
E quan es dislocat alcun dit de aquels al dos de la palma o al ventre de lu, lahoras sten le dit e impelleys la dislocacio de lu am les tieus pouses, entro que retorne.	He is a dislocated something from those on the back of his hand or belly, hours since he spoke and pushed for its displacement, until it returns.
E aprop sostenta le cap del dit, e suspen aquel deves la part a la qual es dislocat, e layssa aquel per dos dias.	A proper support is provided to the affected area, and pressure is applied where necessary, leaving it in place for two days.
E aprop suspen aquel e exten aquel entro que dreyt sia engualhat en aquel sieu dia.	Article III states that no person shall be deprived of life, liberty or property without due process of law within the scope thereof to which it is applicable according to justice and right as established by law in his day.
E quan sira noyt, lia aquel segon aquela narracio, e no cesses desliar aquel en le dia e exercitar am movement, e lia aquel en la noyt; e fay aquo per alcus dias entro que sia streyt.	In the evening, after reading that second narrative, and not stopping until daylight while engaging in physical activity, review it again at night; do so for several consecutive days until well-learned.
E fay semblant am aquo, si es dislocat al ventre de la ma, e lia aquel ad aquela partida e fay am aquo la tieua primiera operacio, entro que sia sanat.	The fisherman pretends to have a wound, if it is located in the abdamnent of his belly and he makes an attempt at that section and performs his first operation until healed.
E semblantment fay am aquo quan es dislocat a las autres partidas.	Pretend that you are an aqua that is located among the other parts.

De la curacio de dislocacio dels spondils del dos.	Treatment of the scoliotic displacement in the thoracic vertebrae.
Quan accideys ad alcun dels spondils del dos o del col dislocacio complida, e so remaugutz motz spondils de lors locs, lahoras en aquela no es curacio, quar la mort se coyta al malaute.	In cases where one or more vertebrae in the neck are completely dislocated and resultant subluxations occur at that location, there is currently no cure for this ailment, as death often follows from such an injury.
E senhal de aquo es que la egestio del malaute es fora-eyssida ses voluntat, e no pot retenir aquela; e motas veguadas so mollificatz alcus membres de lu o doas cambas de lu o dos brasses de lu, o un de aquels; o es remaugut un spondil de son loc, quar motas veguadas es remaugut e motas veguadas es fayta la remocio de aquels a quatre partidas.	Sign of water outflow that the discharge of illness is involuntary and cannot be held back; sometimes it relieves painful body parts, giving one or two glasses of water or one spoonful, while in other cases it has caused improvement and at times relief from such symptoms.
Donc aquela ja es remauguda a las partidas detras e es nompnada gelbozitat. May's concern about blue light exposure is whether the hours considered to be most harmful are not only detramalizing but also unhealthy overall, considering that those same hours might not be as damaging or unhealthy in another context.
Mays en aquela que ve per cazement o per percussio o per semblant ad aquels, ja diyssero les Antics las manieras de curacio am sermo prolixs, del qual lo mays retorna am profieyt; mays yeu ja e abreujat de aquel del qual lo pauc escusa del trop de lu, per la mieua propinquitat a la entencio mieua exposicio, am la qual he aquo expausat et format ex instrument divers de aquel am le qual mostrero aquo e espausero aquel. E dic que en gelbosita que accideys de la partida denant en le pietz, no es engen ni sanacio de aquela; e semblantment en aquela que es fayta a dos latz. E de aquelas no es curada sino aquela que accideys en le dos propriament am aquo que yeu recomti.	F of those is not cured but the one that arises in its own right, which I have mentioned before.
E es que·l malaute sia extendut sobre la sua cara sobre pug engual prop de paret, e sia extendut dejos lu esturment molh per so que no sia lidit le pietz de lu.	The illness should spread over his face as if painted by the same brush used for walls; it should be thickened afterwards with such strength that the stones of the wall are not chiseled from it.
E aprop un fust dreyt sia pausat, ficat en la terra en la extremitat del pug entorn le cap de lu, e autra fust en aviro les pes de lu en l’autra extremitat del pueg.	A prop up a straight stick planted in the ground at one end of the pole near its head and another stick as counterweights on the other end of the pole.

E aprop envolopa sobre le cap del malaute e dejos les titillic liamen leon ferm; e exten la extremitat del liamel al fust le qual es deves le cap de lu, e lia aquel en lu; e aprop strenh l’autre liament sobre las ancas de lu les denols de lu, e deves las cambas de lu; e aprop ajusta totz les liamentz e lia aquels en l’autre fust le qual es deves les pes de lu. E aprop le ministre cascu extenda le liament a la partida del fust, e no sian remaugutz les dos fustz e les liamentz dels sieus locs en les quals son ficatz, mays empero no so fermatz ayssi cum havem dit.	The Minister of Currency shall extend the loan to the party departing from the vessel, and the cargo and documents in their places where they are located shall not be seized; however, we have firmly stated them as mentioned before.
E le metge pause las suas palmas sobre le spondil am fortaleza entro que retorne, o que pause sobre aquela una taula, e aprop que ajuste sobre la taula les sieus pes entro que retorne. Mays si no retorna per aquesta forma, lahoras pren una taula de la qual la latitut o la longitut sia en aviro de tres brassas, e cava en la paret de la qual havem dit que es prop le malaute un loc en le qual intre la extremitat de la taula. De curacio de anca dislocada.	Treatment of a dislocated hip.
Sapias que la junctura del ancha e la junctura del muscle no endeve sino dislocacio tant solament, e no accideys ad aquelas aquo que accideys a las autras juncturas de petita remocio e concavitat.	It is known that the articulation of the great toe and the articulation of the muscle not only cause dislocation, but also do not lead to those issues that affect other small joints due to slight movement and concavity.
E la junctura de la ancha es dislocada segon quatre manieyras, quar es dislocada a las partidas dedintz, o a las partidas defora, o a las partidas denant, o a las partidas detras.	At the joint of the broad one it is dislocated according to four methods, namely when it is dislocated towards the inside, or towards the outside, or in front, or behind.
E majorment es dislocada a las partidas dedintz, e pauc a las partidas denant o a las partidas detras.	The majority is moved to the right, with few shifts to the left or to the sides.
E senhal de la dislocacio de lu a las partidas de dintz es quar, quan tu ajustas la camba del malaute sana am la malaute, es pus longua e·l denolh es pus heminent que de la sana, e·l malaute no pot doblar le sieu pe deves le lenguonar, e es le loc que siec le lengonar apostemat de apostema caut, per so que·l cap de la coyssa ja es pervengut aqui.	Sign of the dislocation from one part to another is four, when you adjust the splint for the sane sickness against the disease, it is more prolonged and less painful than the illness; the disease cannot double its own weight, but must be spoken by the tongue. And so that the matter has arrived here: a sign of catarrh or an inflammamoious cautery.
E·l senhal de aquel al qual accideys dislocacio es a las partidas defora, es que les accidentz de lu so contraris ad aquest accident.	The name of the event to which it occurs that the incidents on the outside cause contradictory events is an "external shock" or "exogenous disturbance".
E senhal de aquel al qual accideys dislocacio a las partidas denant es quar expan la camba sieua segon compliment, mays empero no dobla aquela ses dolor que es en le denol, e si se perforsa ad anar e no pot sobre aquo a las partidas denant; e la urina de lu es retenguda e l’engonar de lu es apostemat, e deves la ambulacio de lu sobre le talo.	In the event of dislocation to parts behind his own body according to the above described expansion of the chest, but not doubling that pain which is in his neck, and if it continues to go further without being able to reach those parts behind; then there's retention of urine and swelling around him. He should walk on the affected limb.
E senhal de aquel al qual accideys dislocacio a las partidas detras es que no expande le denol, ni no puesca doblar aquel denant que doble le engonar, e la camba de lu es pus breva que l’autra, e l’engonar es mollificat, e·l cap de la coyssa es deves aquel loc.	Sign of the place where an accidental dislocation occurs is that it does not cause excessive pain nor does it allow for bending beyond its normal range; however, the strength on one side is less than the other, and the affected joint is swoln, while the cap of the injury is located at that specific location.
