The reduction of spices in this displacement is that you consider, at times, if the displacement is very old and ancient, which has already become outdated according to what you administer regarding its reduction, at times it does not require such a treatment for the entire cure; therefore, there's no need to make an exception.
Mays en aquel del qual la dislocacio es recent, e es una de las quatre specias de dislocacio, lahoras te coyta ad aquo que volvas la junctura e extendas aquela a las partidas dedintz e a las partidas defora, e mau aquela a la dextra e sinistra, quar fort leu retorna e no indigeys de autra cura.	In the case of a recent dislocation which is one of the four types of dislocamts, hours you should return to the joint and extend that area towards both internal and external parts, as well as towards the right and left sides. Do this gently without needing any other intervention.
Mays, si no retorna en aquesta manieyra, lahoras cove que tu prepares ministre fort e extendas la camba de lu de la partida pus dejos, o am las suas mas, o am liament lo qual es liat sobre la camba desus le denol; e autre ministre extenda la ma de aquel desus enayssi que meta las suas mas dejos les titillics de lu; e aprop strenha am liament leon sobre la razit de la coyssa, e tengua autre ministre ters le extremitat del liament.	If Mays does not return in this manner, the hours come when you should prepare to fortify and extend the tent of light for departure on his behard (ordeal), or if it is your lot, then with prayer strengthen him who lies upon the bedding below the canopy; and another minister extends the mantle from above so that he may cover his own arms with the sleeves of the garment; and still another should raise the lion over the rope at the center of the ceremony, and one more should hold taut the end of the mantle.
E sia extencio de lu o de la partida dedintz a l’angonar a la partida de la furcula, o de la partida detras a la partida del dos.	In English: The bee extends from the left or right wing towards the central body to the hind wings, or from the rear edge to the front edge of the hind wings.

If the displacement returns back to what we have said, it is all right; if not, hours are needed for every type of water that will be mentioned regarding one's own injury.
En la reduccio de lu propria, quan es dislocada, e la dislocacio es a las partidas dedintz, cove que·l malaute sia ressupinat sobre le sieu latz sa; e aprop pausa les liamentz sobre la razit de la coyssa en aquel loc le qual entre le cap de la coyssa e·l loc que es dejos le langonar; e aprop exten le liament en sus de la part del angonar a la pus auta partida de la furcula. Mays excuses himself for not obeying this treatment method completely; he hopes that the combined strength of both illnesses will be alleviated with firm determination, loyalty, and on both sides through mutual support.
E sia la longitut de quascun de son par la quantitat de quatre ditz, e sia la camba malaute extenduda mays que l’autre per quantitat de dos ditz.	Let L be the length of each side and Q be its quantity; then let M be the area extended by one more than the other for a difference of two units.
E aprop le malaute sia suspendut sobre le cap del fust, e que sia en la mayso; e sia la longitut de lu de la terra la quantitat de dos brasses.	The cargo is damaged at the top of the hull and it should be lowered; and the length from the deck of the ship is two fathoms.

Mays en la reducio propria, quan es dislocacio a la partida defora, cove que·l malaute jaga sobre pug segon que havem recomtat en le havent gelbozitat; e sia strenhut le liament sobre la camba malauta propriament e sobre le pietz de lu.	In the case of an internal reduction, when it is displaebed outside its proper place, the illness will act upon the limb once more as soon as there has been a relapse in swelling; and the strengthening force lies directly over the affected area itself and over its bones.
E aprop dos fustz sian pausatz, la un als pes de lu, e l’autre al cap; e aprop sian pausatz fustz ajustatz al mieg del pueg ficat sobre·l qual draps humitz sian envolopatz, per so que·l malaute no sia dampnajat per que·l fust sia entre las coyssas de lu, per que deves la extencio a las partidas dejos no sia atirat. Donc, si obezeys a revercio, sira bo grandament; e sino, pausa sobre aquela diligentment e ayssi quo havem dit en gelbozitat per aquela engualment.	If reversed, it's great! And if not, pause on that carefully and thus as we have said in the translation for that agreement.
Mays cove que·l malaute jagua sobre les sieus latz sa quetament.	Mays Cove feels the weight of his choices upon his shoulders as he gazes into the distance.

Donc cum la reducio es complida segon que cove — e·l senhal de la reduccio de lu no es amaguat a tu, e es que tu extendas del malaute doas cambas, e quan tu vezes aquelas enguals e le malaute extrenh la sieua camba e expandeys aquela ses excusacio, lahoras sapias que·l membre segon que cove es retornat — e lahoras tu ajusta doas coyssas e pausa empastre e extrenh am benda ayssi que la ancha no sia mauguda en alcuna de las partidas; e adheresca le malaute a repaus per tres dias o per quatre. E aprop deslia le liament e l’empastre, e compara la una camba am l’autra.	C haste's departure and the subsequent events are compared in terms of their impact.
Lahoras, si vezas aquelas enguals en vustament, lahoras sapias que la dislocacio ja es fermada, e adonc layssa le malaute anar.	When you see those people in their attire, remember that the dispute has been resolved, so let go of any ill will.
E si vezas alcuna causa de mollificacio, lahoras tu retorna e emplastra aquel, e extrenh aquel segon la tua primiera strectura, e layssa aquel en tres dias.	If there is no sign of improvement, within three days you should rebandage that area and remove it according to your initial wrapping technique, then leave it uncovered for three days.
E aprop deslia aquel, e fay aquel tardar en ambulacio sobre quascu per alcus dias, entro que sia confortat.	A short stay at that place and you'll find yourself walking longer distances in no time, taking up to a few days for complete comfort.

Chapter XXII (22) of the United States Capitol refers to a section or division within an official document, such as legislation or report, that is organized in chapters for clarity and reference purposes. If you are referring to the U.S. Constitution, there isn't a "Chapter 22" because it does not follow a chapter system. However, if Capitol .xxxii. refers to a specific piece of legislation or document, please provide additional context so I can give you more precise information on its content and significance.
De curacio de dislocacio del denolh.	Treatment of the shoulder dislocation.
Le denolh es dislocat segon tres manieyras, quar es dislocat a las partidas defora, e a las partidas dedintz, e a las partidas dejos mays a las partidas detras; e a las partidas denant no es dislocat.	The verb "es" is conjugated according to three tenses, namely the present, past and future. In these cases, it follows the rules of location before objects in front, behind, above or below, as well as beside them but not behind. It does not follow any particular rule regarding its position with respect to objects located in front of it.
E le senhal de dislocacio de lu es que comandes al malaute que aplique la sua camba am la coyssa; lahoras sapias que·l denol es dislocat.	The sign of the lunar eclipse is that you command your illness to apply its grip on the wound; then know that the dew is displaced.
